data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Corozal, Belize into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Corozal, Belize
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 11,841 believers in Corozal against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Corozal, Belize.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 11,841 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Jew, English-speaking people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Jew, English-speaking people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Jew, English-speaking people is yours.
Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Corozal to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 50,500 citizens of the the state of Corozal.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 11,841 believers in the state of Corozal the wisdom of how to form simple, reproducible churches of 12-30 in every neighborhood.

location.name: Corozal
location.people_groups_list: Sindhi, Chinese, general, South Asian, general
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Sindhi (1,200), Chinese, general (11,000), South Asian, general (7,900)
